name: 2static
description: Super Simple Site generator for dariomac.com. Inspired by https://github.com/AVGP/susi

scripts.lint: standard 'lib/*.js' --env node --verbose | snazzy; standard 'test/*.js' --env mocha --verbose | snazzy
scripts.findup: echo && find data/*/assets -maxdepth 1 -type f -printf '%f\n' | sort | uniq -d | xargs -I[filename] -n1 sh -c "find data/ -name [filename] -printf 'data/%P\n' && echo"

author: Dario Macchi <dariomac@gmail.com>
